title: This assignment tests you on how to use if else statements when you want to make decisions in the program.

questionText.text:
Write a program that displays the name of the day, based on the value of the day, using the switch statement.
displayNameOfDay(1) → Monday
displayNameOfDay(5) → Friday
displayNameOfDay(25) → Invalid input! Week number should be in between 1-7.
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
